value:
I'm a soldier...but I'm a man of honor
first. I have no problem using force.
But never against my countrymen.

When I fled Bern, it was in a sad
state...our king jumping at shadows,
his underlings vying for influence...

If you need a scout, I'm your man.
Hyperion and I can swoop in behind
enemy lines anytime—no sweat!

Hey, I've been meaning to ask you...
Is Askr...recruiting?

Gonna grab my partner some grub!
Hyperion needs to be fed... But don't
worry—even hungry, he's a big softie.

I'm Heath. I come bearing a personal
message from the summoner I serve,
your friend $Nf.

Yes! Nothing can stop us!
Fly, Hyperion!

Any wyvern rider would be proud of
such growth. Even the most famed
of my foes will stand no chance!

Ugh. With results like this, I should
steer clear of the commander... The
disappointment would be too much.

Oh. This is for me? Thank you! I'll
have you know, I always repay my
debts. So, look forward to that!

I'm Heath, a mercenary. And this
is my wyvern partner, Hyperion.

Phew! The work's not easy, but it's
worth doing. Plus, you've been fair
to me. Makes me, well...glad we met.$k$pMany so-called leaders treat their
men like stepping stones, doing
anything to win... It's shameful.$k$pI am a proud wyvern rider of Bern.
Even forced to abandon my home,
I will never abandon my ideals.$k$pYou follow the path that you believe
is right, one that leads to putting the
needs of others before your own.$k$pThere's no greater honor than serving
such a leader. Finally, I've found one
marking a path I want to follow.
たあっ
でやあっ！
くっ…
貴様…！
Fly, Hyperion!
My lance'll do it.
Well, look at you.
You stop here!
An honorable death...
Yeah?
Name's Heath. The wyvern's Hyperion. We'll have your back if you have ours.
Who—?! ...Oh, it's you.
I refuse to live a life that brings me shame.
Back when I served as a wyvern rider of Bern, our captain was a true soldier...
I'm at a loss. I have no idea what that Legault guy wants with me.
Bern is nothing to me... I have no love for any country that slaughters its own.
I have finally met a master to whom I can swear my true loyalty. It's you.
No problem.
You sure?
Leave it to me.
